ONSITE in London:

Applied is a company on a mission - we're passionate about hiring the best person for the job regardless of race, gender or whether you come from the wrong part of town, whether you're not what they're used to, or whether your dad plays golf with the CEO on weekends.

We've basically redesigned the hiring process from the ground up in partnership with input from some of the leading researchers in this space (Iris Bohnet a lot, Richard Thaler a little) to focus on instrumenting everything and finding the mose predictive assessments.

Think systems observability, but for hiring.

We recently closed a modest (£1.5m) seed round and hiring a few key roles. There are currently 7 of us, including 3 engineers:

No CV/résumé needed.

Product Lead: https://app.beapplied.com/apply/yxopwwtloy Customer Success Lead: https://app.beapplied.com/apply/kkh8ycstu8 Software Developer: https://app.beapplied.com/apply/tfijjxtssl Senior Growth Marketer: https://app.beapplied.com/apply/ofyomqvoqz Data scientist: https://app.beapplied.com/apply/5nebtqtm7x

Small diverse team, equity, risk, reward, you know the drill.
